Package com.pingidentity.sdk.oauth20

Class AccessToken

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pingidentity.sdk.oauth20.AccessToken
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    public class AccessToken
extends Object
implements Serializable
    An access token that has been validated by the server - generally by an instance of a BearerAccessTokenManagementPlugin.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
